For example, the syntax for gtk_table_attach requires 10 arguments by default - the GTK_TABLE, the GTK_WIDGET you want to embed in the GTK_TABLE, then the left_align, right_align, top_align, bottom_align, the horizontal stretch options, the vertical stretch options, the xpadding and then the ypadding
In Qt, you have QGridLayout::addWidget(widget, int row, int col, int alignment = 0);
